Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I've selected the appropriate program based on the criteria.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'From your previous questions?', 3: '6', 4: 'What kind of training is it?', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "That's right. It's more effective choosing this way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What we'll be doing today is the first step of the training programâ€”thinking exercise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thinking exercise?', 3: '10', 4: 'It sounds very philosophical.', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's just a name. The training itself is still fairly practical.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Despite its name, what we're actually working on is tactical thinking as well as improvisational skills.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Many different circumstances during battles could cause us to disconnect from you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Which means the duty to continue our mission and protect ourselves would lie on us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Unlike Lucia and Lee, I'm not very skilled in this aspect.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Sometimes I'd even misjudge the situation like when I opened fire last time... If only I...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't get brought down by what happened.", 3: '16', 4: 'I should have given you instructions as well.', 5: '17'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'As Constructs, we are not allowed to fail.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It wasn't your fault, Commandant. I was weak.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Regardless, all you have to do during the training is to come up with the problems and grade me on how I act, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'll get through whatever obstacles that come up myself... Commandant, please just stand aside and watch.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I am! I'll do my best!", 4: '1'}
